page.title: 05SAINSBURYS IN LEWES ROAD
page.content: With the closure of the Kemptown Railway Branch and Coxes Pill Factory a large amount of land became availible for redvelopment. In 1983 they started to build a new Sainsburys and completed it this year. During an interview with the manager, Mr. O'Sullivan he told us the following interesting facts, it cost {Â£12 million}to build, They employ 240 people. They sell {17 000}products, 26 checkouts that take the {Â£320,000} spent each week. They can park {340} cars in the carpark. Behind the scenes they make their own bread, cakes and cream.They also do all their own butchering and fish prepations.
